TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Pakurung, title = Pakurung, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakurung} }

S.FORM: Pakurung Itiniay i Taitung Cen no Taitung ko Pakurung a niyaro', 106 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 227 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 59% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 133 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 41% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 94 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 33%, Paiwan 3%, Bunun 3%, Rukai 12%, Puyuma 7%, roma 2%.

Pakorong Itiniay i Taitong Cen no Taitong ko Pakorong a niyaro', 106 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 227 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 59% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 133 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 41% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 94 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 33%, Paiwan 3%, Bonon 3%, Rokai 12%, Poyoma 7%, roma 2%.
